description: To get the party started, tattooed pup Jacob Slader binds jockstrapped Tag Adams' wrists and hoists them over his head.  After being doused with hoses, the two wet boys are joined by Jagger and Jason Crew. The four-way action builds to a fever pitch and climaxes in a re-creation of Chi Chi's infamous condom scene that made the original Bang! so notorious.
title: Bang Bang!, Scene #01
